path.description: The path at which to create the route file, relative to the projectRoot. Default is a folder with the same name as the route in the project root.

name.x-prompt: What name would you like to use for the route?

style.description: The value of style element lang attribute

skipTests.description: Do not create "spec.ts" test files for the new route.

load.description: Should the load function run on client and server (universal) or just server

projectRoot.description: The path to your project root, relative to the current workspace. Default is workingDirectory
